remarks: Eliminate a hypothesis containing class variable ` A ` when it is known for a specific class ` B ` .  For more information, see comments in ~ dedth .  (Contributed by NM, 15-May-1999.)
statement:
elimhyp.1 $e |- ( A = if ( ph , A , B ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
elimhyp.2 $e |- ( B = if ( ph , A , B ) -> ( ch <-> ps ) ) $.
elimhyp.3 $e |- ch $.
elimhyp $p |- ps $.
